Reference version 0.2.0

Analyze Event Logs

A load test will return a series of event logs. These functions help analzye the logs.

createLog

Create log file from directory containing run logs

getConcurrentOverTest

Get concurrent connections over the test duration

getEventInterval

Get duration for simple event pairs

getMaxConcurrent

Return the number of concurrent connections

getPageLoadTimes

Get page load times

getSetInputTimes

Get event duration for user interactions with inputs

getTestDurations

Get test duration

Poll During Test

During a load test, see server-reported metrics

poll_multiple

Responsible for polling the desired metrics across all servers and aggregating the results

poll_once

Switches between metrics for one server

poll

Poll server(s) during load test

Load Test Report

createLoadTestReport

Create load test report from template
